title: Calls to 'Defund the Police' Are Serious | 6/8/20
description:
Is racism really as rampant as we’re told to believe? NFL commissioner Roger Goodell now supports peaceful player protests. The Minneapolis city council will dismantle the city’s police department. When protesters say “defund the police,” they mean it. An archbishop in the Vatican wrote Trump a letter diagnosing the real problem by name: Evil. Glenn calls Black Lives Matter out for what it really is. The New York Times opinion editor has resigned after backlash over Sen. Tom Cotton’s “Send in the Troops” op-ed. But is there anything actually wrong with it? Drew Brees' wife has realized that white Americans “are the problem.” President Trump retweeted Glenn’s latest show with Candace Owens, and now she’s canceled from GoFundMe.
